SELECT B.*, M.MEM_NICK,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENTS WHERE BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND COMM_STATUS = 'Y') COMM_COUNT FROM BOARD B, MEMBER M WHERE BOARD_STATUS='Y' AND M.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC, BOARD_NO DESC
